title: In Three Years, Nearly 2 Lakh Women Went Missing In Madhya Pradesh. Here's Why
selftext: Madhya Pradesh has the highest number of missing women and children in India. Hunger, climate change are to blame.
comments:
CLICK BAIT AS FUCK

> Hunger, climate change are to blame.

migration may be the word, definitely not missing (as they were abducted or dead)

Also behind a paywall. So, we dont know what they mean

I wouldn't pay a dime for this crap "news" paper.

Did you even open the article? It's not paid and you can expand the full article. Also, they cite NCRB from Home Minster as the source of the data. Are you saying Home Ministry is lying about 2 lakh missing women?
